review_data.title: “I’m Dani and these are my Nachos”
review_data.content: “I’m Dani and these are my Nachos” What a great dining experience. Super friendly service and delicious dishes - I can whole-heartedly recommend Dani’s Nachos as a starter! I was there this evening 13/08/21 with my teenage kids and thanks to the warm weather we...More

review_data.title: Don't hesitate
review_data.content: Probably the best burritos on earth there... Paty, Dany, we'll be back soon! And we look forward to seat in the restaurant and drink the best Margarita in town as well! KJ Buono

review_data.title: Amazing Mexican food.
review_data.content: I came into the store to pick up some burritos and was greeted by a lovely man and his wife. I had just moved to Switzerland from the USA and this is the first place where I was able to get REAL AND AMAZING Mexican...More

review_data.title: Der Chef kocht aus Leidenschaft
review_data.content: Tip top vor allem das Pulled Pork und die nette Bedienung. Auch einen Parkplatz gibt es hinten im Gebäude.

review_data.title: Hammer! Einfach Spitzenklasse
review_data.content: Der Burrito wird frisch zubereitet. Alle Zutaten sind frisch und schmecken einfach herrlich. Die Bedingung ist sehr freundlich. Es wurden...More

review_data.title: Very relaxed, cheerful bistro run by a friendly couple
review_data.content: Great food and service in an attractive, colourful and warm setting. Excellent value for money in Zurich very close to the Novatel Zurich airport messe hotel. Cannot recommend highly enough - I will be very surprised that if you like Mexican food you do not...More

review_data.title: Truly flavor
review_data.content: Great time at Burrito express. Fresh products and truly flavor. They have for lunch "menu", which is great... Good portions and they also have "a la cartes". It is a Must go...

review_data.title: Geschmacksvoll
review_data.content: Das Essen war sehr gut. Frisch zubereitet und mit einer Brise am Schärfe. Der Wein war für meinen Geschmack eher...More

review_data.title: Eccellente!
review_data.content: Sia i Burritos che i dolci, le bowls e l’atmosfera sono eccellenti. I gestori rendono l’ambiente familiare e accogliente.

review_data.title: Best Burritos and Cheesecake in town
review_data.content: fresh and healthy food (vegetarian possible), lovely owner, good price, great menu and fantastic cheese-cake

review_data.title: excelente comida mexicana
review_data.content: definitivamente es un sitio para recomendar, la comida deliciosa, los anfitriones excelentes personas, el sitio es muy acogedor y los...More

review_data.title: Sehr gute Burritos
review_data.content: Die Burritos schmeken sehr gut! Auch die Salate sind super, wenn‘s mal ein paar Kalorien weniger sein sollen.

review_data.title: A very tasty dinner!
review_data.content: I really enjoyed having dinner here! The food is simple and tasty! Perfect for an easy going dinner without renouncing to feel satisfied! I would love to recommend this place and its super nice owner!

review_data.title: Super fresh!
review_data.content: Best burrito, the guacamole with coriander is always fresh and its so good. You can tell the owners work with passion and love. We will be regular clients!

review_data.title: Best Burritos in Zurich!
review_data.content: Food was fresh and tasty, with great service! I've been to Chipotles in the states and this one is definitely much better! I will definitely come back here the next time I'm in Zurich.

review_data.title: Geheimtipp im Glattpark!
review_data.content: Ich war schon mehrmals in diesem super sympathischen kleinen Burrito Restaurant und kann es nur weiterempfehlen! Mit viel Liebe und...More
